Author: sintos-compa
Text: i've been trying to stop using dates to divide in periods of my life for this purpose because it tends to ruin the remainder of that period (binge at midnight, day is done. binge on a monday, all week is out. binge on the 1st all month is out, etc.) i *actually* managed to convince myself not to go full bingemonster yesterday because i miscalculated my breakfast calories. instead, and this never worked before, i told myself "just sit this day out and tomorrow you can eat "normal" " again. part of me wanted to binge and then exercise to make up for it, but lucky i didn't do it, because later that day i dropped a fucking ice maker on my toe and now i'm panicking because i can't exercise compensate any food.
